trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_SEQ_00<tab>Warin has work for an adventurer willing to exterminate the coblyns attacking ore wagons.

TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_SEQ_01<tab>A swarm of coblyns has taken to attacking ore wagons inside a tunnel south of Black Brush Station. Warin has given you a silver ore cluster, which you must use to lure out the creatures and slay them.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_SEQ_02<tab>You have purged the tunnel of coblyn presence, thus ensuring the security of future shipments. Return to Black Brush Station and inform Warin of your success.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_SEQ_03<tab>Thanks to your martial prowess, the ore will continue to flow and feed Ul'dah's insatiable hunger for ore.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_1<tab>Let's get to it then, shall we?
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_2<tab>Ore wagons pass through this station every day─but not without incident.

TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_3<tab>Wagons coming and going from the Dispatch Yard to the south must pass through a tunnel by Fesca's Watch─a tunnel in which some <var 1A 02 /var>genius<var 1A 01 /var> saw fit to put an ore storehouse, creating ideal conditions for a coblyn nest!
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_4<tab>So now the ore-loving beasts have taken up residence in a tunnel <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> dug, and we're practically delivering meals to their doorstep!

TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_5<tab>But no more. Inside the tunnel in question, you will find a narrow fissure where the coblyns hide. Use this silver ore cluster to lure out the creatures, then slay them.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_10<tab>Well done! It shan't be easy work to keep the tunnel free of coblyns, but our wagons should be able to go unmolested for a time.

TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_11<tab>Disruptions to ore shipments threaten not only the interests of Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern, but of Ul'dah herself. One might liken these train tracks to veins that bear our nation's lifeblood.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_WARIN_000_12<tab>If only we had more <var 08 E905 ((women)) ((men)) /var> like you to lend a hand.
TEXT_SUBWIL064_00307_POP_MESSAGE<tab>A soft skittering sound begins to echo in the tunnel...
